descriptions:
["DescriptionLuxuryProperty.com is pleased to bring to the market this stunning duplex apartment in one of DIFC's best buildings, Central Park Tower.
• Large Terrace with Sea Views
• BUA: 2,038 Sq.ft
• Beautiful Double-Height Window
• Spectacular Glass Chandeliers
• Open Plan Layout Kitchen and Breakfast Bar
• Walk-in Wardrobe and Additional Storage
Heading upstairs to the two bedrooms, you will find ensuite bathrooms attached to both but the master has an additional benefit of having a walk-in wardrobe to fit all your clothes and shoes, as well as an additional storage space at the back, as you can never have too much storage.
Central Park is a twin-tower complex with spectacular finishes from the lobby to the penthouses, fully fitted gymnasium and two pools to enjoy whether you want to relax in the sunshine or get some exercise in the pool.
The development also has a selection of restaurants and shops on the commercial side of the building including Spinneys, Starbucks Coffee and Fogo de Chao - an upscale Brazilian chain restaurant for all-you-can-eat meat carved tableside, making for a memorable experience however many times you go.
The apartment is currently rented until July 2020. (Dominic)"]

descriptions: ["DescriptionGENUINE PHOTOS OF THE PROPERTY. Savills offers you the chance to own this stunning Type 5B, 5 Bedroom family home in Hidd Al Saadiyat. Residents of Hidd Al Saadiyat have direct access to Saadiyat Island's pristine white sandy beach and 5* resorts.This magnificent corner villa has been tastefully modified with the inclusion of an internal elevator and sliding doors between the master suite and bedroom 5 giving the homeowner the option of a much larger suite or keeping with the original 5 bedroom layout.From the villa you have views of the sea on both sides and large park area\xa0The ample garden boasts a large swimming pool, sun deck and entertaining terraceInternal elevatorEnlarged master suiteOpen kitchen, dining and informal living roomSpacious formal living/dining room5 en-suite bedrooms\xa0 (4 upstairs, 1 down)Family hallBalconies on all bedroomsMaid's roomLaundryParking for 5 carsDriver's roomCurrently rented until July 2020\xa0Saadiyat Island is home to the most prestigious neighborhood in Abu Dhabi. The Saadiyat beach residence are a development of 6 apartment buildings with high class communal facilities including two swimming pools, gymnasium, children's play areas, tennis courts and basketball courts. Located within five minutes of prestigious hotels such as St Regis and Park Hyatt giving a great range of high class restaurants. The island also contains one of the best golf course the UAE has to offer.Call Joanna Tate on +971565119864 / +97124411225 or visit abudhabi.savills.ae for further details."]
